Parameter.name: SrcVer
Parameter.Description: Location and Revision of this file in Perforce (Auto-updating)

UDLText.name: T
UDLText.Content: // This Parameter should be updated when synced from Perforce

XData.name: ReportDefinition
XData.Data:
<report xmlns='http://www.intersystems.com/zen/report/definition' queryClass='Custom.AUXX.Report.ZEN.StoredProc.PRSChecker2' queryName='GetRecords' name='PRSChecker2'>
<parameter expression='..DateFrom'/> <parameter expression='..DateTo'/> <parameter expression='..Hospital'/>
<attribute name='datefrom' expression='..DisplayDate(..DateFrom)'/> <attribute name='dateto' expression='..DisplayDate(..DateTo)'/> <attribute name='hospital' expression='..GetHospListDesc(..Hospital)'/>
<attribute name='ReportTitle' expression='$$$Text("@PRSChecker2@PRS Checker 2")'/> <attribute name='timestamp' expression='$ZDATETIME($H, 2, 2)'/> <attribute name='username' expression='..Username'/>
<group name="hospital" breakOnField="HOSPDesc"> <attribute name="description" field="HOSPDesc" />
<element name='CaptionOne' expression='"Date of"_$C(13,10)_"Birth"' /> <element name='CaptionTwo' expression='"Admission"_$C(13,10)_"Date"' /> <element name='CaptionThree' expression='"Discharge"_$C(13,10)_"Date"' />
<group name='Detail'> <element field='Message' name='Message'/> <attribute field='WARDCode' name='WARDCode'/> <attribute field='PAADMAdmNo' name='PAADMAdmNo'/> <attribute field='PAPMINo' name='PAPMINo'/> <attribute fields='PAPMIName,PAPMIName2' name='PatientName' expression='..DisplayName(%val("PAPMIName"),%val("PAPMIName2"))'/> <attribute field='PAADMAdmDate' name='PAADMAdmDate' expression='..DisplayDate(%val)'/> <attribute field="PAADMDischgDate" name="PAADMDischgDate" expression='..DisplayDate(%val)'/> <attribute field='PAPMIDOB' name='PAPMIDOB' expression='..DisplayDate(%val)'/> </group> </group>
</report>

XData.name: ReportDisplay
